title: Remembering Charles Barsotti, Who Drew Cartoons That Hugged Us Back
teaser: Cartoonist Charles Barsotti was known for his simple, often poignant, drawings. Barsotti died Monday at the age of 80. New Yorker cartoon editor Robert Mankoff offers stories about Barsotti.
contentencoded:
Cartoonist Charles Barsotti was known for his simple, often poignant, drawings. Barsotti died Monday at the age of 80. Melissa Block talks to New Yorker cartoon editor Robert Mankoff for stories about Barsotti.
